title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: We don't wanna play dodgeball. It hurts.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Yeah.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: So let's have half the children on this side  and half the children on that side

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Uuh. Excuse me a moment, gentlemen. I don't believe I know how to play dodgeball.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: What? Don't you have dodgeball in France?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Well, no. And actually, I'm not from France-

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Look, Pip, the rules are simple. A kid from that team is gonna try to bean a kid on our team in the head with a big red ball.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Oh, dear.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: If the ball hits you, you're out, but if you catch the ball, he's out, and the last team to still have anybody standing wins.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Oh, what jolly good fun!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: No it isn't, it hurts! I can't believe they let us play this in school.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Kyle, Clyde, Kenny, Stan, Cartman, Pip, Jordan, Swanson, and one other

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Bill, Fosse, Kevin, Bebe, and five others]

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Play ball!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Ow! Ahow-ow-ooooowww!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Dammit, we lost one already!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Aheeheh, you're out, Clyde! Heheheh.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Jordan, Swanson, pull forward! We need backup!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Aaaaah!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: We're losing men fast out here!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Concentrate on your ge-hame! Be the buhaw-hall!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: I caught it! I caught it!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Great catch, Kyle! Now your team's on offense!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Here, Pip. You throw.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Ugh. On, no, I couldn't.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Come on, limey, don't be a wuss! Are you just gonna be a little French pig your whole life?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: I'm not French-

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Throw the ball, you stupid frog!  God-damn, maybe if you didn't eat all those croissants , you'd be able to thr-ow!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Okay, that was pretty good, Pip. But you're supposed to hit the kids on the other team.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Ow, my nose! You broke my nose!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Damn, Pip. I didn't know you had it in you.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Ogh! I'm dreadfully sorry!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: That nose is bleeding pretty bad, Kyle. I think you might have to go to the nurse's office.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: No. No, it'll be okay!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Sorry, son. You'll have to let the nurse look at it. Come on

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Oh. Noooo!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Dude! He's going to the nurse's office.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: I heard the school nurse is hideously deformed.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: I heard she has tentacles and eats children for lunch.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Stan? Has anybody actually seen the nurse, and come back to tell about it?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: No, Cartman. Nobody ever has.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Nurse's Office. Kyle's shadow is on the window. He waits with his hand on his nose. He sees a mouse nibble at some cheese and run away. He looks up, and a door epens.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Kyle looks and shuts his eyes tight

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Are you Kyle Broflovski?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Ye-yes.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: I'm the school nurse. Did you hurt your nose?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Ye- yes.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Young man, Why do you have your eyes closed? I'm not gonna hurt you.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: I know.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: So open them.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Oh.  Phew.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Now, what seems to be the problem?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Aw, I just hit my nose playing dodgeball.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Oh. Well, I'll get you an ice pack.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAGH!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: What?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: OOOOOOOOHHHHHHHHHHH my God!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Oh. I see you've noticed my disorder. I have a stillborn fetus growth attached to my head.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAGH!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: After school, at Kyle's house. The boys are there to listen to Kyle's story

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: And when she moved up and down, the little fetus jiggled.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Eewwww!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Did it talk? The little fetus, did it talk?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: No. No-it looked dead.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Eewwww!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Wa- was it wearing clothes?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Dude, where is she gonna get fetus clothes?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Oh, yeah. Eeww.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Eewwww!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: And then she walked over to-

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Kyle! That is enough! I've been reading up on your poor nurse's condition, and it is nothing to be made fun of. It's called 'conjoined twin myslexia!'

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Who the hell cares what it's called, as long as she doesn't have to touch me.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Now, that's just the kind of unawareness that we need to fight against. Sit down, boys.  You see boys, sometimes, when babies are born, they're born as twins. But sometimes the twins get hooked together, and they're born as Siamese twins.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: But sometimes, after the Siamese twins are joined together, one of the twins dies before birth. The living baby is born with the dead baby still attached. Sometimes, this dead twin is inside the living person, so even you could have a dead twin inside you and not even know it!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: AAAAA! Let me live! AAAAA!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: So now that you're educated about her disease, you won't need to make fun of her. Right, bubbe?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Uuuuuh. Yeah.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: The dining room. Sheila serves dinner to Gerald as he reads the newspaper

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Can you imagine that poor, poor woman?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Mm-hmm.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Feeling like an outcast? Being ridiculed every day?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Mm-hmm.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Hello?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Hello, Sheila? It's Sharon, Stan's mother.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Oh, yes. Hello, Sharon.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Uh-Sheila, I was just wondering if you might know why my son is trying to split his head open with an ice pick?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: No! I have to get it out!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Well, Sharon, I was just trying to educate them about conjoined twin myslexia.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: So this is your fault.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaah!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Damn it, stop.  Oh!  Damm it!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Would you do me a favor? Next time you want to scare the hell out of my child, just go outside and sit in the road until a truck runs you over instead?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: That does it! I must educate the entire town about this awful disease!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Mm-hmm.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: South Park Elementary Gym

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Dude, I don't get it. Why are we playing dodgeball again?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Yeah. I thought we only played on Fridays.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Children! Great news! We've been asked to play in the State Finals for dodgeball!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Groan.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Aw, do we have to?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Can't we just play with that big parachute again or something?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: You-you don't understand, children. If we can win State, we can play in the Nationals in Washington, D.C.!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Heyh! They have a zoo there!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: That's right! Now, come on! We have a lot of practicing to do!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Aren't we supposed to have won something in order to go to State Finals?

text: Hey, Pip. Do you wanna be on my team again?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: I'd love to!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Now, let's try not to send anyone to that monster nurse this time, Frenchy.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Hey! I get quite disturbed when you call me that! You shouldn't make fun of foreigners!  And besides, I hate French people!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Principal Victoria's office. She's meeting with Mr. Mackey and Sheila

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Wwell, Mrs. Broflovski, it certainly is a thrill seeing your cheery face again. What seems to be pissing you off today?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Nothing is pissing me off! I jsut wanta start a movement.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Yah-of course you do!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: I want to talk to you all about your school nurse.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Uh. Nurse Gollum is absolutely qualified to be a-

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: No, no no. I'm not upset about her. I want to make the public aware of her. Her disease should be brought to light so that it can be understood rather than made fun of.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Oh. And uh what disease is that?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Uh, Principal Victoria, Nurse Gollum has conjoined twin myslexia.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: What's that?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: She has a dead fetus attached to her head.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: She does?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Yeah-uh. You never noticed that?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: No-o, I never did.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Well, that's exactly what I'm talking about. This poor woman is forced to live in the shadows because she feels like an outcast. It is up to us to make her feel comf'table and welcome in our town!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Did you say a fetus, sticking out from her head?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: I want to invite your nurse to a dinner party at my house this evening. I'd appreciate it if both you and Mr. Mackey would attend.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Do we have to eat kosher stuff?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Well, I'll talk to Nurse Gollum, but I'm sure she'll be delighted. Let's say around 8?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Wonderful!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Now, you did say she has a fetus on her head?

text: A mountain road. The class is on its way to the State Finals

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Okay children.  Now, who's gonna win the State Finals?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Denver?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Here we go Ca-ows, here we go: Unh! Unh!

role: # HERE WE GO CA-OWS, HERE WE GO
text: Unh! Unh!

role: I think we need to get off on this exit.

text: SIT DOWN, KID!!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: But it's quicker to get to the Denver school that way!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: DO YOU WANT AN OFFICE REFERRAL?!

text: How mant times do I have to explain this to you?! I'm not a student! You can't give me an office referral, and-!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Yes, ma'am.

text: The kids arrive

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Whoa! Dude! This is a school?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: the crowd is cheering. Cows fans are scattered among the crowd

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Hello, there. I'm Bob Thomas, the coach for the Denver Cougars.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: I'm Chef, coach of the South Park Cows.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Welll, I certainly want to thank you for bringing your team down. Apparently, nobody else would play us because they knew we'd just beat 'em silly. Soo, I told the school board to find me some hick school from the mountains, and here you are!  You're from South Park, yeah?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Yeah.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: My G-hod, amazing where people can live nowadays. Well, we might as well get this over with; we've gotta start thinking about D.C. Promise we won't make it too painful.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Play ball!

text: Ehso-uuuh where did you get your degree, Nurse Gollum?

text: Colorado State.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY

text: back at dinner

text: Ehsooo, I-ee hear that the South Park Cows are playing for the State Finals in dodgeball tonight.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Yeah, but you know, it-it doesn't matter though, the- the Denver team always wins, okay?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Oh, I don't know. I think our boys might just have the dead fetus to win-heart!

text: Gerald!  Keep your damn mouth shut!

text: Ih-it's okay, Ms. Broflovski. Really.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Please forgive us. Ah-I'm terribly sorry, Nurse Gollum.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: No, I'm quite secure with it.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: I have felt so bad ever since I heard the boys making fun of you-

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: They're just young boys. Joking is a way for them to come to terms with what they don't understand.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Could I get some more pork?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: So did you ever think of just, you know, having it cut off?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Yes, Principal Victoria, the thought had occurred to me. Unfortunately, it would mean my death.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Ooohh, so I suppose that's out. Uhow about a hat, then?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: No, really, I don't need a-

text: Yes, we could get you a few hats and wear a different one every day. No big whoop!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: I- really- appreciate what you're trying to do here, but it's not necessary. I'm- a pretty happy person.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: I've got it! We could set aside a whole week to make the public aware of folks just like you

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Oooohh, yeess, a Conjoined Twin Myslexia Awareness Week. You know, that has a nice ring-

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: But I really don't think-

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: The- the school could put out pamphlets, mkay? And we could have seminars to educate, mkay?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Ooooh, this is so exciting! I'm gonna get the mayor on the phone right now!

text: Dodgeball State Finals

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: South Park Town Sqaure

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Ladies and gentlemen, this is indeed a great week for South Park. Miss Hermans has opened the east wing of the library, and our own South Park Cows Elementary School dodgeball team is going to the national finals!  Where they will undoubtably be beaten senseless by the Washington team.  But most importantly, this week has brought to my attention a very serious and dreaded disease. Conjoined Twin Myslexia. And so it is in honor of this that I declare this exciting week as Conjoined Twin Myslexia Week!  And now, let's kick off our weeklong festivities with the first Annual Grand Conjoined Parade!  Let's hear it for these brave souls!  What a glorious parade that was! Let's hear it for the parade coordinators!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: You know, Mayor, I really should be accompanying those kids to Washington in case they get hurt. That is my job.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Nonsense. This is your week. You aren't going anywhere.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Somewhere near Washngton, D.C. The bus is going through a lovely meadow

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: How much further is Washington, D.C.?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: SIT DOWN, KID!!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: I need to know how far it is, lady!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: I SAID SIT DOOWWN!!!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Yeah, whatever, you old, dried-up, fat ho.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: WHAT DID YOU SAY?!!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Ah-I said, 'I've always wanted to visit Prague.'

text: D'ogh. Me too.

text: (Sheesh!)

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: A tourist sees the bus coming his way and tries to get out of the way, but the bus crashes into the Vietnam Memorial's right wall, and the engine bursts into flames. He was thrown to one side. The right wall drops down three feet, taking the front end of the bus with it and raising the back of the bus off the ground five feet. Both front doors fall off

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: At Grant Elementary's Gym. Championship banners going back to 1987 hang from the rafters. Posters line the walls

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Damn, man. This is the big time, alright.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Chef, we're hungry.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: You can eat after the game! You children win this one, and you're National Champions! Then you can go on and play the Chinese.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: My mom says there's a lot of black people in China.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: What?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Are you Chef?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Yeah.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: The Washington team has forfeited the game. Congratulations, you're national champions.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: What? We did it! Children, we won!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Wow! That was easy.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Ladies and gentlemen, let's hear a round of applause for the new national champions of dodgeball! The South Park Cows!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Hey. Why did you guys forfeit?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: You mean, you don't know?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Know what?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Last year's national champions were the Austin Pirates. They played China for the world championship. Only four of them came back alive. Chinese dodgeball players aren't like us.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Bush langli. Woon taun. Waya ching gia!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: They do nothing but dodgeball, day in, and day out. They use steroids and advanced training equipment to make them, not kids, but animals.  Well, good luck. We've got our futures to think about.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Okay, children. Back in the bus.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: South Park City Hall. Many people are seated at table waiting for the evening's events to unfold

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: And so, at this honorary dinner we take a look back at our beloved Nurse Gollum and the brave life she has lived. Roll the tape, please, Mr. Garrison.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Oh, no!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: You've got the strength, you've got the courage

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
role: Even with a dead fetus on your head

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
role: Dead fetus or no, you never let go!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
role: # The Scenes	she's painting her house orange, and annoyed that
text: Garrison is filming it

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
role: # she looks out the window, and is annoyed that he is still there,
text: filming

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
role: # annoyed, she's trying to cover the camera lens so Garrison
text: would stop filming

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
role: # at the post office, she's trying to shoo him away

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
role: # She's very angry that he's filming her

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
role: # Now we see why. She's on the toilet, and she clamps her legs
text: shut, with hands before them for added security. She's outraged

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: there are sobs here and there, a smattering of applause

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Oh, that was so touching!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Hand now, friends, hit's time to present the Lifetime Conjoined Twin Achievement Award. This award goes to outstanding conjoined twins who have made a mark on society. And the winner is

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Nurse Gollum.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Nurse Gollum!!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Oh boy.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Excuse me, Mayor, but I just received some news that you might all be interested in.  Our South Park Cows have jsut beaten the Washington dodgeball team, and are on their way to the world championship in China.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Somewhere near China. The bus is going down a slope

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Okay, children. Now, we're almost to China! I want you all to try and focus on your game.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: But Chef, we don't wanna play the Chinese!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Nonsense! If we win this one, we're world champions!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: But we could get killed!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: And just what price would you pay for eternal glory?  Just imagine: a big yellow Dodgeball Champions banner hanging in the cafeteria! Imagine it!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Dude, Chef has lost it.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: You'll be in the news all over the world. South Park will finally have a sport that it's good at. Oooh, children. It'll be glorious.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Sure! Captain Ahab has to get his whale, huh?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Dude, what does that mean?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: I dunno.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Hey, isn't that kid Kevin Chinese?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Yeah. You're from China.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: No, I'm from America. My parents are Chinese.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Tell us how the Chinese play dodgeball!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: I have no idea, dude.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Come on, rice-picker!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Hey, hey hey!  Children, that's not cool! You don't make fun of somebody because of their ethnicity!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: You don't?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: But Chef, you just ripped on Chinese people.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Nonononono. That's different. I made fun of them because they are from China. You see, it's not okay to make fun of an American because they're black, brown, or whatever, but it is okay to make fun of foreigners because they are from another country.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Oooooh.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Oooh, I get it.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Yeah.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: The bus has reached the temple. On the side is a banner that reads

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Haaaaaaaaa!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Hiit ita wita great pride, that huwe huwelcome ourn American friends. Now let the  champions of dodgeball be deshide!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Damn, dude, China's fucked up!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Take places!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: All right. Let's go, Cows! Let's show 'em what we've got.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Okay, Kam, rooks rike a-mericans are getting ready to play. I don't suppose they'll have any problems seeing the ball with their BIG American eyes.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Yeah. Good thing they have those uh big eyes so that they don't have to rery on that amazing American interect.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Oh, you bet that stings!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: I can shing 'em.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Praaayyy Brar!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Holy crap.  God-dahamn!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Hey, hey! What do you call white American person wit Ph.D. in a physics anda math?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Ah. I don't know. Rwat?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Stupid American!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Aw! No, wait!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: A Chinese player takes aim at Cartman, who turns and runs away squealing. The ball gets him anyway, and he tumbles away

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Oooh, another American is down! It's numberrrr, aaahhhm. Oh, I don't know, all Americans look alike.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: A Chinese player serves and hits Kenny with such force that the ball picks him up and splatters him against the wall, then bounces up and away. Paint falls away and cracks are left in the wall. Blood pours out quickly. The crowd jumps up and cheers

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Oh my God, they killed Kenny!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: You bastards

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Oooh, my. I haven't seen an American die like that since Abraham Lincoln!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Dude, that isa not cool! You're gonna get us into trouble again.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: South Park Town Square. The town is assembled yet again

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Ladies and gentlemen, on this fourth day of Conjoined Twin Myslexia Week, all our prayers are with our little South Park Cows now playing their hearts out in China.  Now, join me in saluting our Cows and help make Nurse Gollum not feel like an outcast with our first official Conjoined Twin Myslexia Hat!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: The Temple. Chef is tending to his injured players. Kyle is hooked up to an IV unit. The other players are bandaged up according to the severity of their injuries

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: And these is a only a one South Park prayer left.  Still aallll Chinese player. This should be over veerry shortly.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Come on! Throw ball!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Hey! You ah wanna hear my impersonation of American?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Yeah, yeah!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Ah. Okay.  Hey. I rearry rearry want that. That hurts good.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Heyheyhey. Let me try, let me try. I'll use my credit card.  Eh. Eh. Uh. Do you have any non-dairy creamer?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Yeah, Yeah!  Y'all come a-back now, hear?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Oh! What have I done?  You know, Eric? I just realized something. I have been obsessed, and obsession isn't good. If we had won the world championship, what then?  It would only be a bigger letdown the nest year if we didn't win! Our lives would have to revolve around dodgeball. Our lives were fine before! Oh, I'm sorry, children. I let it all go to my head. Can you ever forgive me?  Come on, forget this stupid game! Let's go home.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Come on! Praya ball!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Hey, if you wanna make him throw the ball, say this.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Thank you, American dumbass!  You French piece of crap, throw ball.  What's the matter, Frenchy? You got crepes in your ears?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Aaaaaaaaah!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: And the winner is South Park Cows!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Everyone! Everyone, look! I won the game! We're world champions! Mr. Chef, Mr. Chef. South Park is the world champion in dodgeball. Oh, glorious day!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Shut up, Pip!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Yeah, shut up, Pip!  Can we go home now?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Did you all see? I can't believe I threw such a ball with my own arm. It was-

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Shut up, Pip!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: South Park Town Square. The Mayor is on stage

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
role: The Mayor	This year as Conjoined Twin Myslexia Week draws to
text: a close, I wold like to personally thnak all of you for your enthusiastic cooperation. [the crowd cheers] Now, let's hear it one more time for our World Champion South Park Cows! [the team is standing behind a low wall with a trophy at one end, next to Chef]

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: What the hell is eveyone wearing on their heads?

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: And now, let's hear from the woman of the week, the incredible, courageous, Nurse Gollum!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Aaah!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Dude, it's the freak nurse!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Holy crap.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Dammit, Kyle! We've been working all week against that kind of behavior!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Well sorry, dude. We weren't here.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Thank you, Mayor. I uhhh, wa-I I don't know what to say; this has been quite a week.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: She's really touched.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: What I really wanna say is well, -egh this may sound odd coming from a woman with a fetus sticking out of her head, but you're all a bunch of freaks!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Uuhh. Freaks with big hearts! And now, le-

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Don't you realize that the last thing I ever wanted was to be singled out? I just wanted to do my job and live my life like any normal person, but instead, you've made everybody focus on my handicap all week long.  Look, I don't want to be treated different. I don't want to be treated special orh-or treated gingerly or-I just want to be ridiculed, shouted at, and made fun of like all the rest of you do to each other.  And take those stupid things off your heads!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Oh, my. What an ungrateful bitch.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Yyeehh, the nerve of some people!

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Hey, you know. That nurse is actually pretty cool.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: Yeah. Maybe that dead fetus makes her smarter.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: I love you guys.  Ah, screw you guys.

title: CONJOINED FETUS LADY
text: end of Conjoined Fetus Lady
